docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Complete guide to using Smart Trash system
docs.employeeManagementDesc: In the "Employees" section, you can add new employees, manage their access rights and track their activity.
docs.collectionAreasDesc: Create and manage waste collection points in your company.
docs.analyticsDesc: Track the effectiveness of your company's waste sorting program.
docs.companySettingsDesc: Configure your company profile, upload a logo and configure system parameters.

help.title: Help and Support
help.subtitle: Frequently asked questions and support contacts

addEmployee.q: How to add a new employee?
addEmployee.a: Go to the "Employees" section, click "Add Employee" and enter the email. The employee will receive a registration invitation.

createArea.q: How to create a collection area?
createArea.a: In the "Collection Areas" section, click "Create Area", specify the name and description, then add containers.

viewStats.a: Open the "Analytics" section to view detailed statistics on sorts, containers and employees.

changeSettings.a: Go to the "Settings" section where you can change the name, description and upload the company logo.

noInvite.q: What to do if an employee did not receive an invitation?
noInvite.a: Check the email address is correct. If the problem persists, try deleting and re-adding the employee.

about.title: About System
about.subtitle: Information about Smart Trash platform
about.systemGoalDesc: Smart Trash helps companies effectively manage waste sorting, increasing environmental responsibility and reducing negative impact on the environment.
about.technologiesDesc: We use modern technologies: artificial intelligence for waste recognition, cloud computing and mobile applications for convenience.
about.securityDesc: All data is protected by modern encryption methods. We comply with all personal data protection requirements.
about.scalabilityDesc: The system easily scales and can be adapted to the needs of companies of any size - from small businesses to large corporations.

api.title: API Documentation
api.subtitle: GraphQL API documentation
api.endpointDescription: The system uses GraphQL API for all operations. You can use GraphQL Playground to test queries.

guide.title: Getting Started Guide
guide.subtitle: Step-by-step system setup instructions
guide.setupCompanyDesc: Fill in company information, upload a logo and configure basic parameters.
guide.createCollectionAreasDesc: Create waste collection areas in your company and configure containers for each area.
guide.addEmployeesDesc: Invite employees to the system by sending them registration invitations.
guide.setupAchievementsDesc: Create an achievement system to motivate employees to actively sort waste.
guide.monitoringDesc: Track sorting statistics, employee activity and program effectiveness.
